comments:

occurred" and a log file is generated. I can't tell what is missing or not 
being shared correctly. I am new to XP and Eclipse ver 3.0, so I may have 
something set up incorrectly.  Below is the log detail.

It seems to me that the configuration files and folders in the configuration 
folder can not be read by non admin user, am I correct?
If this is the case then make the whole configuration folder read only for all 
the users.

Thanks for the comment Pascal. I eventually did find out how to change the 
settings of my folders so that I could see the Security tab and manually grant 
the proper access rights to the specific folders I needed to in the Eclipse 
directory.
